item.title: How Entites could interact
item.description: How can we implement interaction between entities? Before we can actually answer that question, we should formulate the actual problem. Summary There are two problems in an ECS when it comes to interaction between entities: read and write access. The truth is that interactions do not really exists, they hide the implementation of the underlaying relationship. A relationship is then nothing else than the transformation of data.
